name: Market Data Latency Spike
description: L2 cache exhaustion causing significant latency increase
service.name: market-data-feed
log.message: WARN: P99 latency > 3000ms - L2 cache hit rate degraded to 45%

name: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: External payment gateway experiencing high latency

log.message: ERROR: Upstream gateway connection timeout after 5000ms

name: Trade Service Database Connection Pool Exhaustion
description: Database connection pool saturated causing service degradation
service.name: trade-service
log.message: ERROR: Cannot acquire database connection from pool - all 50 connections in use

name: Order Processor Memory Pressure
description: High memory usage causing garbage collection pauses
service.name: order-processor
log.message: WARN: GC pause time 850ms - heap usage at 92%
